title: Base
description: This is the Base schema for Brickchain documents. All Brickchain documents use this as its base, and includes most fields from the base document.

@context.description: URI to this schema document (see JSON-LD)

@timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the document was created

@id.description: A unique identifier of the document (uuid)

@certificateChain.description: The certificate chain that was used as proof of current signature

@realm.description: The name of the realm that owns this document
